Jogo EXTREMAMENTE divertido. BALANCEADÃSSIMO E SUPER JUSTO. Morra Behavior, morra.

Fun game design, very unique and enthralling. Unlock system is satisfying, and free killers and survivors are sufficient for success.  Balance at high levels is piss-poor, and some toxicity is to be expected, but at low levels I have lots of happy interactions with killers and survivors alike!

Really fun game, but can be tough to get into since some killers are really good.
so instalar e ganhar nao recomendo
I been huge fans since this game release, and i got chances to play this year. still the best game i remember.

This game is like a kick in the teeth. It hurts, makes you mad and you wish it would stop. But it doesn't and probably never will. With that said, everyday i want more. Gen speed goes to fast and some people are pretty toxic. That's the DBD life for a killer main like me. Get it when its on sale, the 20 DLCs are a little much at full price.
OH! and if you want to play Survivor have fun! They are the clear choice to start with when learning the game.

This used to be a great game, but over times, developers slowly but surely ran it into the ground. Firstly, the boosts and nerfs come completely randomly and without any considerations of the community - every patch is pretty much a lottery in what you'll get. Secondly, the game has a big cheater problem. Don't bother submitting reports - the devs only look at video proof, and even then, it's incredibly easy to get another account and cheat all the unlockables on it. Easy Anti Cheat does absolutely nothing except kick you out of matches randomly if you're a legit player. And finally, the most recent matchmaking system broke the game completely - wait 20 minutes to get either newbies who are playing their first game, or groups with 2000 hours+ who'll just decimate all but the most proficient killers. There is no in-between. If you're new to this game, this is probably the worst time ever to come in.
Es la verdad enviciante y nunca te aburres, hay tensiÃ³n siendo superviviente y asesino... es genial jugarlo de noche y totalmente solo jeje. Recomendado!!
ish de bet gem ai eva payed

It's a fun game. Not super scary as you know there is another player playing the killer. Sometimes a jump scare depending on what skills the killer has and load-out they have chosen.
Matchmaking can be pretty messed up, but usually only for the lower/mid ranks.
Ranking system is just bragging rights, nothing more. 
Would like to see survivor abilities implemented so that there is a reason to play different survivors rather than just unlocking their perks to play with your favorite survivor.
Overall the game is well structured and has a few bugs here and there but would rate it well compared to other company's games I have played online vs....*cough* Ubisoft *cough*

Both halves are done really well. The trembling suspense as a survivor group trying to repair generators and escape is thrilling. Playing the role of an infamous serial killer like Michael Myers or Leatherface is everything I imagined it would be. 10/10
The killer face camping is really lame...
Very good game, give it a try.

It had potential but the devs are killing this game with each patch. The final straw was them implementing the disconnecting penalty, if the game randomly crashes with no fault of your own, you get a penalty, the game is currently full of bugs and at times the only way of leaving the game is to disconnect. They claim it to be a party game rather than competitive, what a fun party it is when you get disconnected in the loading screen and get a d/c penalty.

do NOT play this game unless you are gonna play survivor only - which I guarantee you, 99.99% of the "Positive" reviews are from survivor-only f**ktards. Matchmaking is stupid af literally matches you with 4 survivors who's rank is 10+ higher than you or 4-men queue who communicates through voice chat which makes the game miserably easy and stupid. It's literally 4 people bullying one guy playing monkey in the f**king middle. 

Are you a f**king masochist who likes to get unncessarily stressed over some stupid ass game that nobody even gives a fuck about? Do play this. Otherwise, turn back and never look back. Nothing here but dying game due to retardedly toxic community that doesn't even know its own problem. Did I tell you that matchmaking takes about 5-10 mins every match? Yeah, because nobody plays this shitty game.

The devs never listen to their community which resulted in them nerfing Hillbilly lately, the most balanced killer imo.
I would have given them a negative review a long time ago but i waited till now to give them a better feedback.
NOBODY asked for a nerf, nor was it necessary at all. I'm a survivor main and play him very rarely but it's not hard to realize that you made him trash tier now, i'll never play him again. Thanks devs for nothing, again.
It makes me think of the sweet release of death.

Good game

the amount of times I've clenched my asscheeks playing this game is something money can never buy... beautiful game

crappy developers, bad decisions, bunch of small but terrible changes, repetitive, uninteresting, lackluster, bad execution, no excitement, bad connection, crashes, terrible players, toxic community.
